name: The Creepy Mansion Game
description:
The Creepy Mansion Game is a 2.5D side-scroller/puzzle game that using lane mechanics and a ghostly companion to complete level.

This was my first large scale group project using an engine other then Unity, this time using Unreal Engine 4. It took about 9 weeks to make, and is quite far from our intended goal but shows my skills in Unreal 4. Thanks for giving it a looking

Controls:

  • A and D to move left and right
  • Space to jump
  • Scroll wheel to change lanes
  • R to change to ghost companion
  • Left click to use weapon
  • Right click to pick up crates
